description: A very simple and quick salad or side dish bursting with freshness.
keywords: Green salad,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Heirloom Tomato Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the dressing by combining the oil, balsamic and mustard and set to one side. Slice the tomatoes and place on a bed on rocket.
Add the goats cheese to the top of the tomatoes and then drizzle with dressing. Garnish with the basil before serving.
